body:
### ScalaFX - Ensemble.
ScalaFX Ensemble is a project which is inspired from [http://jfxtras.org/](http://jfxtras.org/) which is developed in JavaFX. Instead this project is developed in [ScalaFX](http://code.google.com/p/scalafx/). The project is in early stage of development stay tuned for further updates !!!! 

### Update 
We are very actively working to create more examples from the various goodies of ScalaFX. But to keep you updated here is the attached screenshot. 

![black screenshot](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10783650/Screen%20Shot%202012-12-01%20at%2010.29.14%20PM.png)

### A Small Update 
We are very actively working to get the first release out. But to keep you posted here is the attached screenshot. Though its a small update (and doesn't have anything big) it motivates us to more forward
even faster. 

![larva cut](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10783650/Screen%20Shot%202012-11-23%20at%207.30.19%20AM.png)
name: ScalaFX - Ensemble
